bio: Blockchain Expert | Web3 Master | Digital Marketer | Certified Metaverse Expert
impactDescription: The utility token that facilitates transactions on the Creath Art Marketplace, enables platform governance and empowers its users. CGT holders play a beneficial role in the development of Creath by participating investment opportunities from staking and in decision-making processes.
contributionDescription:
The Creath Art Marketplace is built on the Ethereum Blockchain and designed to be a digital gallery for artists, curators, collectors, and art lovers. We connect creatives such as traditional artists, digital artists, photographers and sculptors with collectors.
The marketplace attracts a global target audience that will participate in the primary sales of our curated collections.
reportReason: relevant impact (NFTs) is not on Optimism
